installer.title: Floorp-installation
installer.description: Installer Floorp-browseren og få en privatlivsfokuseret, hurtig og tilpasningsvenlig browseroplevelse.
installer.adminRightsEnabled: Installer for alle brugere med administratorrettigheder.
installer.adminRightsDisabled: Installer kun for den aktuelle bruger.

exitConfirmation.title: Afbryd installation?
exitConfirmation.message: Hvis du afbryder installationsprocessen, bliver Floorp ikke installeret.

complete.legacyDownloadMessage: You can also try the legacy installer.

slide1.title: Velkommen til Floorp
slide1.description: Welcome to the latest version of Floorp, a web browser developed with a focus on development and research in Japan. The content introduced next is only a part of the project.

slide2.title: Regular Updates
slide2.description: Floorp is maintained and updated continuously, even as a community-based project. We deliver safe browsing aligned with the principle that the web should be accessible freely to everyone.

slide3.title: Latest Features
slide3.description: The latest version of Floorp leverages cutting-edge web features developed by Mozilla's Firefox. It has also been redesigned to make tools everyone desires easily accessible.

slide4.title: Advanced Customization
slide4.description: Equipped with numerous customization options to maintain privacy better than your default browser. Floorp allows you to realize your preferred configuration.

slide5.title: Fighting for You
slide5.description: Floorp blocks harmful tracking. We balance website operation and user rights, working to improve the web both in functionality and privacy.

errors.signature_verification_failed: Signaturverificering mislykkedes. Udførelse afbrudt af sikkerhedshensyn.
errors.signature_verification_error: Der opstod en fejl under signaturbekræftelse: {{0}}
errors.installer_execution: Der opstod en fejl under kørsel af installationen: {{0}}
errors.browser_not_found: Floorp-browser ikke fundet. Installationen lykkedes, men den eksekverbare browser kunne ikke findes.
errors.admin_rights_denied: Administratorrettigheder blev nægtet. Du valgte administratorrettighedstilstand, men tilladelse blev nægtet.
errors.exit_code_not_found: Kunne ikke hente installationens exit-kode. Administratorrettigheder er muligvis blevet nægtet.
errors.user_installer_launch: Kunne ikke starte installationsprocessen med brugerrettigheder: {{0}}
errors.user_installer_execution: Der opstod et problem under kørsel af installationen med brugerrettigheder: {{0}}
errors.cpu_not_supported: This device's CPU does not support SSE4.1. Floorp requires a processor with SSE4.1 support.
errors.cpu_check_failed: Failed to verify CPU requirements. Please check system requirements.
